locs.text: chontachts2.db fail praapt karane se pahale sunishchit karen ki aapaka fon root kiya gaya hai. in pathon ko aazamaen:
yadi ve kaam nahin karate hain, to root fail prabandhak mein apane divais kee /dat nirdeshika dekhen.
sampark pradaata se praapt android sampark detaabes fail nahin milee hai.
android sampark detaabes fail maany nahin hai.
maichard string khaalee nahin honee chaahie.
yah string maany maichard sampark ka pratinidhitv nahin karatee hai.
maichard sampark string maany nahin hai.
kaard pradaan nahin kiya gaya hai.
khaalee naam ya khaalee poora naam vaale vchard se maichard string nahin banaee ja sakatee.
aisa koee soshal meediya aip nahin hai.
koee soshal meediya feeld nahin hai.
maan jaanakaaree {0} ke lie soshal meediya maan nahin hai. apekshit visualchard-sochial, {2} maanon ke saath {1} mila
{0} ke lie, kam se kam ek sankshipt naam aur ek naam apekshit hai. {1} maan mile. sanket:
{0} ke lie, aip ke lie ek milaan sankshipt naam apekshit hai. {1} mila. sanket:
